description.en: Through the power of blockchain, Atheneum has formed the world’s first Decentralized Autonomous Learning Organization (DALO), a free-market, educational ecosystem governed by a decentralized body. This model is fundamentally designed to provide accountability, proof-of-learning, and affordable education to peoples across the globe.
